snippet.title: Linked Mask - Demo Gameplay | Upcoming Game Boy Styled Retro Platformer Adventure |
snippet.description:
Linked Mask - Demo Gameplay | Upcoming Game Boy Styled Retro Platformer Adventure |

"Six towers, each hiding a mask that grants the power of a natural element. Obtain them all by navigating through a set of increasingly difficult twists and turns in Linked Mask - a captivating call-back to the golden days of the Game Boy era."

Linked mask game on steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1111590/Linked_Mask/

Become a Channel Member:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjKCvuYXHol9RMUp_4Ndpew/join
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Buy me a coffee, much appreciated!: : https://ko-fi.com/indiejames

Twitter: https://twitter.com/JamesWhoisGamer

My patreon: https://www.patreon.com/IndieJames

Donations: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=XRYBYX7QXU3EJ

Thank you for watching!
